function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate public compliance with policy measures","Impact":"High R0, leading to uncontrollable pandemic spread","Mitigation":"Enforcement of policy measures, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Rising transmission rate (beta) due to inadequate mitigation measures","Impact":"Increase in daily infections and transmission rate","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional mitigation measures, improvement of existing measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Public health authorities, policy makers","Owner":"Government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited success in moving to the desirable portion of the pandemic control graph","Impact":"Continued risk of uncontrollable pandemic spread","Mitigation":"Intensified policy measures, targeted interventions based on data analysis","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling tools","People":"Policy makers, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, research institutions"}]}
